args:
The cause of the surge of fiends in the Halidom
is a strange magic sigil drawn by an unknown
party—but the group's relief at getting rid of it
soon fades when a giant pumpkin-headed fiend
makes straight for a nearby village. With no
time to rest, they ready themselves for battle.
We searched the castle and nearby woods,\nbut couldn't find anything that would be\ncausing these fiend attacks.
Er, {player_name}? Perhaps you\nmight come with me? I'd like to help you\nwith this if I can.
Oh, Silke! You're wearing a costume, too?
Yes. The sylvan girl made it for me.
Eee hee hee! This makes me happy.
So where is it you want to go?
Wait, that's it? You're done complimenting\nme? ...Rrrr. Fine, then. Follow me.
Is it some manner of drawing?
It looks rather similar to the sun.
What's a sun have to do with Halloween?\nYou think it's marking something, maybe?
If this is supposed to be a trick,\nit's not a very good one.
...Wait. That's no random drawing;\nit's a sigil that attracts fiends!
I didn't know such a thing existed.
They do indeed—although I'm certainly\nsurprised to find one here.
This must be why all the fiends keep\nattacking the Halidom.
In that case, can we clean it up or erase\nit somehow? Or is it more complicated?
No, simply removing the sigil should\nbe enough to solve the problem.
Then let us do so at once!
If I can remove a stubborn stain from my\nmaster's tunic, I can certainly clean away\nthis foul sketch!
All right!\nThat takes care of it!
I wish we'd noticed that before; we could\nhave saved a good deal of trouble.
Don't be hard on yourself—why would any\nof us pay heed to a mere scribble?
Thanks for pointing it out, Silke.
Eee hee hee! It was all for you,\nmy beloved {player_name}.
And with that, I do believe it is time\nfor us to resume preparations for the\nHalloween party.
What, now?! Can't we rest first?
Absolutely not. Do you realize just how far\nback this nonsense has set our schedule?
Now, come! Everyone to your posts!
I'm back from my patrol, Your Highness.
Thanks, Elly. Sorry for asking you to do\nthat on such short notice.
Your caution was warranted; we DID just\nfinish getting attacked by packs of fiends,\nafter all.
However, I'm pleased to report no further\nsigns of trouble around the castle—likely\nbecause we eliminated the sigil.
Er, but if I can ask...why did you go on\npatrol in that costume?
I, um... W-well, that is to say...
We simply cannot rule out the possibility\nof fiends attacking anew!
It's certainly not because I thought it was\ncute and couldn't bear to take it off!
Sure! It's not every day I get to see you\ndressed up like that, you know?
...Er, Your Highness? Might I ask you\nsomething?
Ack! Bad! REALLY bad! TERRIBAD!\nWe've got a group of fiends attacking a\nnearby village!
Oh dear. I hope this is not our fault.
You think they changed their target to the\ntown because we got rid of the sigil?!
There's this absolute monster of a fiend\nwith a pumpkin head, and he's getting\nready to go TO town ON the town!
Right now, saving the village must be our\ntop priority.
It appears we still have some work to do\nbefore we can consider this matter laid\nto rest for good.
